commands: scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ark.skin.choose 1

commands: function satsu_iron_man_addon:ark_recharge

execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.closed.armors=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.closed.armors
